ABOUT US
St. Pats is the perfect fusion of a classic Irish pub, a relaxed ambiance, and fun for the whole family. This combination makes it the ultimate gathering spot in Deerfield Beach for residents and visitors alike.
With our commitment to creating an enjoyable and vibrant atmosphere, serving top-notch food and drinks, and employing the most welcoming staff in town, St. Pats guarantees that you’ll immediately feel at ease at your new favorite hangout.

THE SCENE
St Pat’s Irish Pub is a reinvention of the historic Irish Pub everyone loves, combined with modern day chic lounge. We’ve incorporated inventive cocktails, chef crafted food, arcade games and a dance floor to our venue accommodations.
VENUE OCCASIONS
Birthday Parties
Bridal Showers
Anniversary / Engagement Parties
Bachelor / Bachelorette Parties
Graduation Parties
Corporate Celebrations
Holiday Parties
Charity Events & Fundraisers
Receptions
Dinner Parties
STANDOUT VENUE FEATURES
2 Full Service Bars
Full Service Restaurant
17 Flatscreen TVs
Full Arcade
Pool Table
Claw Machine
